entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who had a motorbike and was going to give it to Harry. He knew that Black would try to kill Harry if he gave him the boy.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is the one who tried to kill Harry by throwing him off the bike into the sea. Hagrid suspected that Black was going to do this.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the boy who was supposed to be given the motorbike by Hagrid. He is also the son of Black's best friends.

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Madam Rosmerta is the one who commented on Black's failure to disappear after trying to kill Harry.

relationships.description: Hagrid suspected that Black was involved with the Dark Side and would try to kill Harry.
Black attempted to kill Harry by throwing him off the bike into the sea.
